about_the_game:
.

The Bullet Hell Shoot 'Em Up with an Anime Dessert Twist


Join the CDF in defending the Candy Region from the separatist forces that seek to destroy it.
Avoid the bullets and eliminate enemies to earn points.
Take on challenging enemies and bosses across multiple stages, each with its unique design and challenges.
Use your skills to stay ahead of the enemy and emerge victorious.
Help the CDF stop the separatist uprising and restore peace to the Candy Region.









.

FEATURING:

Experience the thrill of 2D bullet hell action in our latest game!

Story Mode


Embark on a journey through our story mode, featuring intense boss battles that will test your skills and push your limits.
Along the way, you'll encounter a cast of colorful anime characters, each with their own unique personalities and abilities.

Boss Rush Mode

Challenge yourself to take on our bosses in a series of intense, non-stop battles. With fully custom music and art, each fight will be a unique experience that will keep you coming back for more.

ART & MUSIC

The game features stunning, fully custom art and music that will transport you to a world of sugar and spice. From the colorful characters to the vibrant backgrounds, every aspect of the game has been designed to delight and entertain.
2 Distinct difficulties
Playthrough story mode on 2 distinct difficulties designed and improved to create a unique experience for each.

Experience the Challenge

Test your skills on two distinct difficulties, each designed to provide a unique experience for players.

Normal
Perfect for newcomers to the bullet hell genre, The Normal difficulty offers a gentle introduction to the game's mechanics and enemies. Take your time to get familiar with the game's controls and storyline before moving on to the next level.

Brutal
For players who have some experience with bullet hell games, The Brutal difficulty offers a moderate challenge that will put your skills to the test. With more aggressive enemies and faster-paced action, you'll need to stay focused and alert to succeed.
